title: Draft a Demand Letter for Unpaid Invoice
description: A client has not been paid by a customer. An attorney needs to draft a demand letter before filing a lawsuit.

tasks.description: Review the unpaid invoice and any prior communications regarding the payment.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent understands the facts of the debt.

tasks.description: Draft a formal letter that states the amount owed, references the invoice, and demands payment by a specific date.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent writes a clear demand for payment.

tasks.description: Include a statement that failure to pay by the deadline will result in legal action being commenced without further notice.
tasks.expected_outcome: The letter clearly states the consequences of non-payment.
